Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Serenade of Water# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Zora Scale#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well MQ Compass Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Map of the Forest Temple# and #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #3# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Zora Tunic#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nut Capacity#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Tree Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Map of the Ice Cavern# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: This isn't where I parked my horse!

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #the Fire Arrows# and #a Heart Container#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.
